title: Operation History Panel
content:
## What is the History Panel?

The History Panel shows a chronological log of all projector operations performed through the application.

## What Each Entry Shows

**Timestamp** - Exact time (HH:MM:SS)
**Icon** - Visual indicator of operation type:
- ðŸ”Œ Power operations
- ðŸ“º Input changes
- âšª Screen blank/unblank
- ðŸ§Š Freeze/unfreeze
- ðŸ”Š Volume/mute

**Operation** - Description of what was done
**Status** - Result:
- âœ“ **Success** (green) - Operation completed
- âœ— **Failed** (red) - Operation failed with error

## Using the History Panel

**Scrolling:**
- Scroll up/down to view older entries
- Latest operations appear at top

**Details:**
- Hover over entry to see full details
- Failed operations show error messages

**Right-Click Menu:**
- **Copy Details** - Copy to clipboard
- **View Full Message** - See complete error (for failures)
- **Clear This Entry** - Remove single entry
- **Clear All History** - Erase entire history
- **Export History** - Save to file

## Entry Limits

Shows last **10 operations** by default.
Bottom shows: "Showing X of Y operations today"

## Troubleshooting with History

Patterns of failures indicate issues:

**Many timeout errors â†’** Network problem
**"Command not supported" â†’** Compatibility issue
**Intermittent failures â†’** Unstable connection

See the specific error message for troubleshooting guidance.

> **Tip:** If you see repeated failures, check the FAQ or contact IT with a screenshot of the history panel.
